mapper.select: select o.`id`,o.`goods_num`,o.`goods_code`,o.`goods_name`,o.`goods_count`,o.`goods_type`,o.`mfrsid`,o.`brandname`,o.`retail_price`,o.`price_sum`, o.`cost_price`,o.`cost_sum`,o.`whole_price`,o.`whole_sum`,o.`position_id`,o.`create_time`,o.`danju_number`,o.`order_number`,o.`yundan_number`, o.`zhidan_people`,o.`danju_day`,o.`tuihuo_number`,o.`factory_number`,o.`beizhu`,o.`unit`,o.`batch`,o.`zhuce_number`,o.`produce_day`,o.`useday`,o.`classtype`, o.`factory`,o.`status`,o.`username`,o.`returnzt`,m.`mfrsname`,p.`position_name`,g.`goodsname` as gdname, o.`stockorder` from stock_order o left join c_mfrs m on o.mfrsid=m.mfrsnum left join c_position p on o.position_id=p.position_id left join c_goods g on o.goods_type=g.goodsid where o.id = #{value}
mapper.delete:
delete from stock_order where id in
#{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT o.goods_num, o.goods_name, o.factory, produca.produc_factorycolor, m.materialname, produca.size, o.create_time, o.goods_code, o.useday, o.batch, o.zhuce_number, o.produce_day, o.goods_count, parts.parts_style, jpcp.sph_id AS jscpsph, jpcp.cyl_id AS jpcpcyl, jpcp.lightbelow_id AS jpcplightbelow, jpcp.refractivityid AS jpcprefractivityvalue, light.light_name AS jpcplightname, lens.lens_name AS jpcplensname, jpdz.sph_up AS jpdzSphUp, jpdz.sph_down AS jpdzSphDown, jpdz.cyl_up AS jpdzCylUp, jpdz.cyl_down AS jpdzCylDown, jpdz.lightbelow_right AS jpdzLightbelowRight, jpdz.lightbelow_left AS jpdzLightbelowLeft, jpdz.refractivityid AS jpdzrefractivityvalue, yxcp.sph_id AS yxcpsph, yxcp.cyl_id AS yxcpcyl, yxcp.curvature AS yxcpcurvature, yxcp.diameter AS yxcpdiameter,
yxdz.sph_up AS yxdzSphUp, yxdz.sph_down AS yxdzSphDown, yxdz.cyl_up AS yxdzCylUp, yxdz.cyl_down AS yxdzCylDown, yxdz.curvature_one AS yxdzCurvatureOne, yxdz.curvature_yi AS yxdzCurvatureYi, yxdz.diameter_one AS yxdzDiameterOne, yxdz.diameter_yi AS yxdzDiameterYi,
u.usage_name AS yxcpusagename, t.type_name AS yxcptypename, h.main_capacity, h.second_capacity, tyj.size AS tyjsize, tyj.produc_factorycolor AS tyjproducfactorycolor, old.size AS oldsize, ol.degrees, old.produc_factorycolor AS oldproducfactorycolor FROM stock_order o LEFT JOIN aa_produca produca ON o.goods_num = produca.produc_num LEFT JOIN c_material m ON produca.materialid = m.materialid LEFT JOIN aa_parts parts ON o.goods_num = parts.produc_num LEFT JOIN aa_jpcp jpcp ON o.goods_num = jpcp.produc_num LEFT JOIN aa_jpdz jpdz ON o.goods_num = jpdz.produc_num LEFT JOIN a_lightbelow l ON jpcp.lightbelow_id = l.lightbelow_id LEFT JOIN p_light light ON jpcp.light_id = light.light_id LEFT JOIN p_lens lens ON jpcp.lens_id = lens.lens_id LEFT JOIN aa_yxcp yxcp ON o.goods_num = yxcp.produc_num LEFT JOIN aa_yxdz yxdz ON o.goods_num = yxdz.produc_num LEFT JOIN p_usage u ON yxcp.usage_id = u.usage_id LEFT JOIN p_type t ON yxcp.type_id = t.type_id LEFT JOIN aa_hly h ON o.goods_num = h.produc_num LEFT JOIN aa_tyj tyj ON o.goods_num = tyj.produc_num LEFT JOIN aa_oldlens old ON o.goods_num = old.produc_num LEFT JOIN a_olddegrees ol ON old.old_id = ol.old_id
and o.danju_number = #{danjuNumber} and o.goods_type = #{goodsType}
